com.SIMRacingApps

Class MSPECShiftLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SIMRacingApps.MSPECShiftLight

  • public class MSPECShiftLight
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the interface to the MSPEC Shift Light.

    This document was used as the reference to this implementation.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeffrey Gilliam
    Copyright:
    Copyright (C) 2015 - 2016 Jeffrey Gilliam
    License:
    Apache License 2.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • MSPECShiftLight

        public MSPECShiftLight(SIMPlugin SIMPlugin,
                       int commPort,
                       java.lang.String function)
                throws MSPECShiftLight.MSPECShiftLightException
        Constructor to initiate a connection to the MSPEC Shift Light when connected to the same machine as the SIMRacingApps server.
        Parameters:
        SIMPlugin - The current SIM plug-in.
        commPort - The comm port number the light is assigned to.
        function - The function of the light. (rpm,green,blue,yellow)
        Throws:
        MSPECShiftLight.MSPECShiftLightException - If there is a problem connecting to the light.
